rows.label: xs03050100_MSG0001
rows.name:
Kill all Earthlings...
You really did just that, didn't you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03050100_MSG0002
rows.name: That's right. They just ran out of luck.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03050100_MSG0004
rows.name: You shouldn't have come to this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03050100_MSG0005
rows.name:
You speak fluently.
Are you different from the others?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03050100_MSG0007
rows.name:
In your words,
I suppose it would be Squad Leader.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03050100_MSG0009
rows.name:
If this is your planet, I apologize for
the discourtesy of landing without permission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03050100_MSG0010
rows.name:
But our ship was attacked by unknown enemies
and we crash-landed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03050100_MSG0011
rows.name:
As fellow beings living in this universe,
we ask for your understanding and tolerance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03050100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Understanding? Tolerance?
I don't know those words.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03050100_MSG0015
rows.name:
Apparently, the law of the jungle
is the only logic that works here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03050100_MSG0016
rows.name:
Fine.
The fact that you know Earthlings means[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03050100_MSG0017
rows.name:
our history with you
didn't just start now.[ST:wait ]
